MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCollapsed As Boolean
public: property bool IsCollapsed { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值指出功能區群組是否摺疊。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the ribbon group is collapsed.

value.span: 如果群組已摺疊則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the group is collapsed; otherwise, .

value.span: 登錄預設值為 。

span.span: The registered default is .

value.span: 如需有關哪些因素會影響值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 摺疊的狀態，在功能區群組的外觀與行為就像功能表按鈕一樣。In the collapsed state, a ribbon group looks and behaves like a menu button. 下圖顯示功能區，並且**剪貼簿**，**段落**，並**插入**其摺疊的狀態中的群組。The following illustration shows a ribbon with the **Clipboard**, **Paragraph**, and **Insert** groups in their collapsed state. 當群組摺疊成功能表按鈕時，開啟下拉式清單時顯示其最大的大小變化。When a group is collapsed into a menu button, its largest size variation is shown when the drop-down is opened. ![功能區與摺疊的群組](~/add/media/wpfribbon-small.png "摺疊的群組使用的功能區")![Ribbon with collapsed groups](~/add/media/wpfribbon-small.png "Ribbon with collapsed groups") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

related.span: 功能區配置和調整大小

span.span: Ribbon Layout and Resizing

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必須介於 1 到 3 個大寫字元，而且不得包含空格、 定位字元或新行字元。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 按鍵提示有時也稱為存取金鑰或加速器，用來作為啟動控制項的快速鍵組合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按鍵提示會出現在當您按 ALT 鍵。KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每個功能區控制項繼承屬性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果設定屬性，則不會顯示功能區的增強型工具提示; 將改為顯示標準的工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
